```{r}
library(ggplot2)
data <- diamonds

data[c('carat', 'price')]

View(data[order(data$carat), ])

plot(data$carat, type = "l")

```


```{r}
thisPlot2 <- ggplot(data, aes(x = price, y = depth, color = clarity)) + 
        geom_point(alpha = 0.25) +
        geom_smooth(method = "loess",  se = FALSE)
      
      thisPlot2
```
